roleset.name: drunken, riotous merrymaking

example.name: Business carousing
example.text: In another room, a Taiwanese businessman based * in Dongguan carouses with a party cadre from Yunnan who *T* is trying * to attract investment.
example.arg: a Taiwanese businessman based * in Dongguan
with a party cadre from Yunnan who *T* is trying * to attract investment.
